title: How to Swing Breach in Rainbow Six Siege

steps.headline: Plan your attack.
steps.description: At the start of the round, select an attack operator that possesses breaching charges.

steps.headline: Find an area to breach.
steps.description: Look for an object in an area where rappelling is possible.

steps.headline: Approach the building.
steps.description: Follow the on-screen prompts to rappel up to the window.

steps.headline: Apply the breaching charge on the window.
steps.description: Ensure that the window is intact.

steps.headline: Position yourself on top of the breaching charge.
Push off from the window following the on-screen prompt.
steps.description: Detonate the breaching charge at the height of the swing. Use the same button used to place it.

steps.headline: Check the operator's position.
steps.description: At this point, your operator should now be inside the building.

text: Plan your attack. At the start of the round, select an attack operator that possesses breaching charges. Find an area to breach. Look for an object in an area where rappelling is possible. Approach the building. Follow the on-screen prompts to rappel up to the window. Apply the breaching charge on the window. Ensure that the window is intact. Position yourself on top of the breaching charge.  Push off from the window following the on-screen prompt. Detonate the breaching charge at the height of the swing. Use the same button used to place it. Check the operator's position. At this point, your operator should now be inside the building.
